events.message: I received my order last week, but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
System has categorized the customer's issue as a refund request based on keywords in the message.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund processes for quicker resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you want a refund. Let's work together to resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product arrived in good condition, but I just changed my mind and would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. You can return the product within 30 days for a full refund. I will send you the return label and instructions shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate your quick response and clear instructions.
I have emailed you the return shipping label and detailed instructions on how to send back the product. Let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to see if you have successfully returned the product and if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was processed and no further questions were raised, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
